item.title: [DISTRELEC-3636] Price Calculation: If feeRegulation unavailable, assume code 4
item.description:
Example: article 850841 / 11081010

  • there is no movex article for this product
  • hence fee regulation is not available
  • if this article is placed in the cart alone, the shop offers "free shipping"
  • => it should instead assume feeRegulation code 4 which results in normal (or express) shipping calculation
item.summary: Price Calculation: If feeRegulation unavailable, assume code 4

comments.comment:
After discussion with Raphael:
if a movex product is missing, there are also other errors, e.g. a rebate model cannot be applied due to missing informaiton.
The suggestion is to make a product "not buyable" if the movex product is not available.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3714] Brightcove // Player & Plugin integration - File placement
item.description:
The attached plugin-files should be placed in the following folders on our servers:
/_ui/all/cache/DistrelecBrightcovePlugin.js
/_ui/all/cache/DistrelecBrightcovePlugin.swf
item.summary: Brightcove // Player & Plugin integration - File placement

comments.comment:
file uploaded and committed.
do we need to perform a grunt update to generate the frontend files?

the two files should not be placed in the /cache folder. the folder is only for generated assets that may be deleted and regenerated. I would place both files in this folder: /hybris/bin/custom/distrelecB2Bstorefront/web/webroot/_ui/all/media/brightcove/

if you want the DistrelecBrightcovePlugin.js to be included in the builded base.js file (via grunt), then you have to place it in /hybris/bin/custom/distrelecB2Bstorefront/web/webroot/WEB-INF/terrific/js/static/plugins/

and run "grunt prod" to generate the new frontend base files.

Syntax:
/hybris/bin/custom/distrelecB2Bstorefront/web/webroot/_ui/all/media/brightcove/{Country-Code}

Example for CH:
/hybris/bin/custom/distrelecB2Bstorefront/web/webroot/_ui/all/media/brightcove/CH

Please place the files in the specified folder like in the example for CH.

I've commited and now the file are placed here:
/distrelecB2Bstorefront/web/webroot/_ui/all/media/brightcove/CH/DistrelecBrightcovePlugin.js
/distrelecB2Bstorefront/web/webroot/_ui/all/media/brightcove/CH/DistrelecBrightcovePlugin.swf
